message.introduction: My name is Thomas Nugent and my wife and I are Century 25's smokers. We are not looking for freebies, but would like you to know that the last two cartons of Century's we purchased were damaged. Not the carton itself but the packs inside.
message.issue: The carton was damaged. Maybe it was the...
message.note: We have been Century smokers for about 8 years.
